channel.title: Stupid Shit
channel.description:
Anybody ever do some stupid shit? Here's what I did today.
Well today coming home on the school bus (about an hour ago) me and my friends were yelling shit out to people in cars and people walking by. We got stopped at a red light. My friend Austin said "stupid car lady!". Then my friend Alex said "Buy a better car dumb ass!". Then the lady was like "shut the fuck up stupid kids!". Then Austin and Alex were telling me to say something and I thought it was funny and I said "That's a piece of shit car bitch!". And we all laughed then the bitch got out her car (her car wasn't that bad actually, just fucking around) and pounded on the school bus door. My bus driver said "what's going on!?!". Then the lady said "three little mother fucking kids are saying shit to me out the window!" (this is in a ghetto voice). And the bus driver started laughing and then the bus driver asked who said stuff. The lady got on the bus and walked fast to us three and said "these kids right here". Bus driver yelled at Austin, Alex and I and then told to lady to get off the bus, as we were holding up traffic.
Consequences: Suspended off bus for sticking my head out the window. One day.

item.title: Stupid Shit
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

Davidi2:

Sticking your head out the window is against the rules, it sounds like you were the stupid one here

I know, I was saying I did some stupid shit and got in trouble

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid Shit
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:9, topic:388607”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=484427.msg3549717#msg3549717 date=1301431664]

I broke into a house and stole all of the light bulbs, and I am not trolling o.o

Win.
I would like to steal all the batteries instead/also.
[/quote]I wish I would of saw there reactions, come home flip on lights and NOTHING…Open the fridge no lights ;D etc etc. Would of be pretty funny.[/quote]
Successful troll was successful!
